trans-unit.source: Used to arrange overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> items.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> might not have enough space to show all of its items.

When this happens, the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> can be placed in the ToolBarOverflowPanel, which is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.

For an example of how to use a ToolBarOverflowPanel in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, see [ToolBar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarOverflowPanel"></xref> class.
Arranges and sizes the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarOverflowPanel"></xref> object.
Size that a toolbar overflow panel assumes to position child elements.
The size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarOverflowPanel"></xref>.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref>.
The new collection is used to add cached information to every child or to intercept actions such as layout updates.
Logical parent of the new collection.
A new collection.
Remeasures the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarOverflowPanel"></xref>.
Constraint size is an upper limit.
The return value should not exceed this size.
The desired size.
Gets or sets the recommended width for an overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> before items flow to the next line.

If you set WrapWidth to 100, the width of the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> is 100, and all the items that can fit into an area of that size are in the main <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
If there is only one item, and it requires a size of 120, the toolbar width expands automatically from 100 to 120.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
A double value that represents the recommended width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarOverflowPanel.WrapWidth*> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToolBarOverflowPanel.WrapWidth%2A> dependency property.
To be added.
